welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Norriton, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope your stay here is filled with unforgettable experiences and fond memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport provides exclusive services for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport provides services for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport offers exclusive services for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at North Philadelphia Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network by selecting the 'PNE Airport Wifi' network and entering the provided password.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, designed for international flights and featuring modern amenities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Upper Bucks Airport caters to VIP and executive travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
